div.h2: VhDir Digital Certificate Standard Value Set

div.p: This value set includes a list of standards defining digital certificates.
This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

ul.li:
Include these codes as defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/ig/vhdir/CodeSystem/codesystem-digitalcertificate
CodeDisplay
x.509v3x.509v3A standard published by the International Telecommunication Unionâ€™s Telecommunication Standardization Sector (ITU-T) that defines a framework for public-key certificates, including specification of data objects used to represent the certificates themselves.
